name: remarkable-mermaid-plus
description: Plugin for Remarkable to process embedded mermaid code in Markdown text. Supports both client-side and server-side rendering.

notes.serverSideRendering: Server-side rendering is limited with mermaid v10+ due to async API. Plugin automatically falls back to client-side rendering.
notes.mermaidVersions: For full server-side rendering support, consider using mermaid v8.x or v9.x. v10+ requires client-side rendering.
